oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1946-07-27 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on July 27, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Homegrown Trio; Hiram Higsby; Ann Bond; Lem Hawkins; Prairie Songbirds
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening statements and theme / (1:15) Hiram Higsby introduces Chuck Davis / (1:38) Chuck Davis perform "Dragging The Bow" / (2:45) Hiram Higsby, Allan Page, and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (4:07) The Homegrown Trio performs "Ragtime Cowboy Joe" / (5:44) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:20) Hiram Higsby performs "No Vacancy" / (8:40) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (9:05) Ann Bond performs "Pins And Needles In My Heart" / (11:00) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (13:30) Lem Hawkins performs [Unidentified banjo tune] / (14:24) Hiram Higsby, Lem Hawkins, and Allan Page tell a joke / (14:48) The Prairie Songbirds perform "Home Sweet Home On The Prairie" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Bond, Ann;
